channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sangamo Therapeutics’ stock falls the most in 16 years after Pfizer ends hemophilia pact
item.description: Pfizer move means Sangamo won’t receive an expected payout in the first quarter, creating a cash overhang.

item.title: Nvidia to open-source Run:ai, the software it acquired for $700M to help companies manage GPUs for AI
item.description: Nvidia has completed its acquisition of Run:ai, a software company that makes it easier for customers to orchestrate GPU clouds for AI.

item.title: The world’s first industrial-scale plant for green steel promises a cleaner future

item.title: Inside the AI agent revolution: How data-driven automation transformed the enterprise in 2024
item.description: In a recent survey, 82% of tech executives said they intend to integrate AI agents across their stacks within the next three years.

item.title: Why 2025 will redefine data infrastructure: 11 expert insights on sovereign clouds, exploding data, PaaS and more
item.description: Key predictions from data infrastructure industry experts and vendors to help enterprises tap the AI opportunity for growth in 2025.

item.title: Forrester on cybersecurity budgeting: 2025 will be the year of CISO fiscal accountability
item.description: With 90% of cybersecurity and risk leaders predicting they'll see budget increases in 2025, many are facing a new era of accountability.

item.title: The AI Hype Index: Robot pets, simulated humans, and Apple’s AI text summaries
item.description: Separating AI reality from hyped-up fiction isn’t always easy. That’s why we’ve created the AI Hype Index—a simple, at-a-glance summary of everything ...

item.title: This international surveillance project aims to protect wheat from deadly diseases

item.title: Semiconductor-stock index heads for ominous ‘death cross’
item.description: A key corner of the U.S. stock market was flashing an ominous signal just ahead of the new year.

item.title: It has been another disappointing year for bonds. Why now isn’t the time to throw in the towel.
item.description: Longer bond yields are on pace for their biggest four-year climb since 1981 — the tail end of Jimmy Carter’s presidency.

item.title: Longer dated Treasury yields edge up in final session of year
item.description: U.S. bond yields fell on Tuesday, as trading thinned out ahead of the New Year break.

item.title: Why 2025 will be the year of AI orchestration
item.description: For many, 2025 will be the year of AI agents, when pilot programs, experiments and use cases converge into something resembling ROI.
